Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001248.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]

Item.Name: Geyser Point Bar & Grill
Item.Content:
Geyser Point Bar & Grill in Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Geyser Point Bar & Grill

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18663158.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Stake your claim at a poolside eatery featuring explorer-worthy bites, trails-end spirits and stunning views of Bay Lake. Nestled in the heart of Disney’s Wilderness Lodge, this scenic outpost boasts a walk-up window and an all-day menu.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Roaring Fork
Item.Content:
Roaring Fork in Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Roaring Fork

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002080.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Rush by for a rapid repast: continental and hot breakfast served in the morning and gourmet sandwiches, grill items and pizza later on. Try a roast beef bleu cheese sandwich or a signature Wilderness Salad. Beer and wine are also available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: Territory Lounge
Item.Content:
Territory Lounge in Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Territory Lounge

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002217.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
A rustic décor, northwestern wines and delicious appetizers like flatbreads and wings are welcome, familiar territory. Specialty cocktails and beers such as Moosehead and Red Hook are featured, as is a full bar. Try the pear blossom cosmo.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Whispering Canyon Cafe
Item.Content:
Whispering Canyon Cafe in Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Disney's Wilderness Lodge, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Whispering Canyon Cafe

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002376.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
For a rowdy, rootin’ tootin’ good time, round up the whole family for hearty western fare and antics aplenty.
Rob says...
My family loves this restaurant. You can get the build-your-own platter and eat to your heart's content. The cornbread is great as well as the atmosphere. Be sure to ask for ketchup!
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Short code: whisp
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!
